title: Is We Dumb? | Dog Door. Free Car. Ironing. Conjoined Twins.
description:
New life motto. If a grotesque hunchback wants to help you fight in a battle, you better let them or he will kill you and all your friends. It will make sense, we promise. Let's talk about that, a Spirit Halloween store inside of a jail, ironing clothing in extreme places, alcohol warning labels passing the blame, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

* BAD MAGIC PRODUCTIONS GIVING TREE: givingtree@badmagicproductions.com *

 

Watch this episode on YouTube:  https://youtu.be/B1Y-uVbcxRQ

 

Show Links:

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
